description: This is a test source file for the 'universalinit' project, specifically testing the 'AstroTemplate' class and related project initialization functionalities. It contains test cases using pytest to verify project setup, configuration loading, template variable replacement, and post-processing execution.

methods.name: test_astro_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the AstroTemplate correctly provides initialization info, including the environment setup command.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the full project initialization process, ensuring files are created and content is correctly replaced.

methods.name: test_parameter_validation
methods.description: Checks that only valid parameters are accepted for project setup, and invalid ones are rejected.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Ensures that the post-processing script runs successfully and the expected side effect occurs.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file and parsing it correctly.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Verifies that template variables within files are correctly replaced with project parameters.
